title: State Of The Union Analysis And A Look Ahead
teaser: NPR's Ron Elving muses on what next for President Obama and Congress, after the president delivered his State of the Union speech.
contentencoded:
NPR’s Ron Elving muses on what next for President Obama and Congress, after Obama delivered a State of the Union speech last night that Republicans slammed as divisive and counterproductive.

Guest

  • Ron Elving, senior Washington editor for NPR. He tweetsÂ @NPRrelving.
